  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1084</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yom Kippur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Yom Kippur</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A site that is designated to teachers who teach Jewish holidays in school. The site has lesson plans as well as educational aims and information on Yom Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teacher guide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Elul. Tishrei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Yom Kipur</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Site, die zu den Lehrern gekennzeichnet wird,
die jüdische Feiertage in der Schule unterrichten. Die Site hat
Lektionpläne sowie pädagogische Ziele und Informationen über Yom 
Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un site qui est indiqué aux professeurs qui 
enseignent des vacances juives à l'école. Le site a des plans 
de leçon aussi bien que des objectifs et l'information éducatifs sur
Yom Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um local que seja designado aos professores que 
ensinam feriados jewish na escola. O local tem plantas da 
lição as.well.as alvos e a informação educacionais em Yom Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un luogo che è indicato agli insegnanti che 
insegnano le feste ebree a scuola. Il luogo ha programmi di 
lezione così come gli obiettivi e le informazioni educativi su Yom 
Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιοχή που υποδεικνύεται στους δασκάλους που 
διδάσκουν τις εβραϊκές διακοπές στο σχολείο. Η περιοχή 
έχει τα σχέδια μαθήματος καθώς επίσης και τους εκπαιδευτικούς 
στόχους και τις πληροφορίες για Yom Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un sitio que se señala a los profesores que 
enseñan días de fiesta judíos en escuela. El sitio tiene 
planes de la lección así como punterías y la información 
educativas sobre Yom Kipur</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehreranleitung</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Elul. Tishrei</string>
